text: its bark smooth and light grey
its bark rough and deeply furrowed, a dark brown color
its bark shaggy, peeling away in irregular plates
its bark papery and peeling, revealing lighter layers beneath
its bark grey and regularly fissured
its bark scaly and a rich reddish-brown
its bark thick and corky to the touch
featuring a distinctive diamond pattern on its bark
with patches of vibrant green moss clinging to its bark
adorned with splotches of grey-green lichen
its bark having a subtle silvery sheen
its bark so dark it appears almost black, especially when wet
a tiny, perfectly carved miniature door almost hidden at its base
strange, almost geometric patterns seem to naturally form in its bark grain
